item.title: Strapi Plugin Ratings
item.description: Ratings is a Strapi plugin that allows your users to post reviews. Enable and manage user reviews for your content very easily! item.title: How To Enable And Manage Comments In Your Strapi Application
item.description: Outline Introduction Prerequisites What is Strapi Comment Manager? Installation Configuration Display comments on the frontend Installation of Strapi Comments Client Usage of Strapi Comments Client Plugin settings Manage comments Full source code of the frontend Conclusion Introduction A comment system comes in very handy for pretty much any kind of website. In the JAMstack ecosystem, while it’s ok to rely on third party solutions hosted on their own platform such as Disqus to enable comments, you usually want to keep your content and all the stuff related to it in the same admin dashboard.
